notes: Climpag contains methodologies, tools, data and maps for a better understanding and analysis of the effect of the variability of weather and climate on agriculture. It aims at bringing together the various aspects and interactions between weather, climate and agriculture (including crops and grasslands, livestock husbandry, forestry and fisheries) in the general context of food security.

organization.name: fao
organization.description: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
organization.title: FAO

resources.name: Climate Impact on Agriculture (Climpag)
resources.description: Climpag contains methodologies, tools, data and maps for a better understanding and analysis of the effect of the variability of weather and climate on agriculture. It aims at bringing together the various aspects and interactions between weather, climate and agriculture (including crops and grasslands, livestock husbandry, forestry and fisheries) in the general context of food security.

name: climate-impact-on-agriculture-climpag
title: Climate Impact on Agriculture (Climpag)

groups.description: Climate change threatens our ability to ensure global food security, eradicate poverty and achieve sustainable development. Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from human activity and livestock are a significant driver of climate change, trapping heat in the earth's atmosphere and triggering global warming.
groups.name: climate-change-adaptation
groups.title: Climate change adaptation and resilience
